db:abstract.db:para: Provides a way to select dates from a calendar.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:listitem.db:para: Calendar is part of Buttons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Calendar allows selection of dates from a grid of days, similar to QCalendarWidget.
The dates on the calendar can be selected with the mouse, or navigated with the keyboard.

The selected date can be set through selectedDate. A minimum and maximum date can be set through minimumDate and maximumDate. The earliest minimum date that can be set is 1 January, 1 AD. The latest maximum date that can be set is 25 October, 275759 AD.
The selected date is displayed using the format in the application's default locale.
Week numbers can be displayed by setting the weekNumbersVisible property to true.
You can create a custom appearance for Calendar by assigning a CalendarStyle.

db:section.db:title: dayOfWeekFormat : enum
db:section.db:para: The format in which the days of the week (in the header) are displayed.

Locale.ShortFormat is the default and recommended format, as Locale.NarrowFormat may not be fully supported by each locale (see Locale String Format Types) and Locale.LongFormat may not fit within the header cells.

db:section.db:title: frameVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines the visibility of the frame surrounding the calendar.
The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: maximumDate : date
db:section.db:para: The latest date that this calendar will accept.
By default, this property is set to the latest maximum date (25 October, 275759 AD).

db:section.db:title: minimumDate : date
db:section.db:para: The earliest date that this calendar will accept.
By default, this property is set to the earliest minimum date (1 January, 1 AD).

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.3] navigationBarVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines the visibility of the navigation bar.
The default value is true.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.3.

db:section.db:title: selectedDate : date
db:section.db:para: The date that has been selected by the user.

selectedDate will not be changed if undefined or some other invalid value is assigned.
If there are hours, minutes, seconds or milliseconds set, they will be removed.

db:section.db:title: style : Component
db:section.db:para: The style Component for this control.

db:section.db:title: visibleMonth : int
db:section.db:para: This property determines which month in visibleYear is shown on the calendar.
The month is from 0 to 11 to be consistent with the JavaScript Date object.

db:section.db:title: visibleYear : int
db:section.db:para: This property determines which year is shown on the calendar.

db:section.db:title: weekNumbersVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines the visibility of week numbers.
The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: clicked(date date)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the mouse is clicked on a valid date in the calendar.
date is the date that the mouse was clicked on.
The corresponding handler is onClicked.

db:section.db:title: doubleClicked(date date)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the mouse is double-clicked on a valid date in the calendar.
date is the date that the mouse was double-clicked on.
The corresponding handler is onDoubleClicked.

db:section.db:title: hovered(date date)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the mouse hovers over a valid date in the calendar.
date is the date that was hovered over.
The corresponding handler is onHovered.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.3] pressAndHold(date date)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the mouse is pressed and held on a valid date in the calendar.
date is the date that the mouse was pressed on.
The corresponding handler is onPressAndHold.
This signal was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.3.

db:section.db:title: pressed(date date)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the mouse is pressed on a valid date in the calendar.
This is also emitted when dragging the mouse to another date while it is pressed.
date is the date that the mouse was pressed on.
The corresponding handler is onPressed.

db:section.db:title: released(date date)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the mouse is released over a valid date in the calendar.
date is the date that the mouse was released over.
The corresponding handler is onReleased.

db:section.db:title: void showNextMonth()
db:section.db:para: Sets visibleMonth to the next month.

db:section.db:title: void showNextYear()
db:section.db:para: Sets visibleYear to the next year.

db:section.db:title: void showPreviousMonth()
db:section.db:para: Sets visibleMonth to the previous month.

db:section.db:title: void showPreviousYear()
db:section.db:para: Sets visibleYear to the previous year.
